data.text: @HislopMD Wish it was as gene therapy is probably exactly what's needed to protect people.

@SweetFreedom12 @HislopMD I hope you’re not in favor of marketing medical treatments without any burden to prove efficacy.

Oh, too late....
@RickK101 @HislopMD I hope that you are not pushing for the mandatory medical treatments / injections and such....that would be a total disaster...

@SweetFreedom12 @HislopMD Traffic laws, public education, FDA, truth in advertising, limits on smoking, minimum drinking age...  Yeah, it’s all Communism when viewed from the perspective...

of a loony libertarian fantasist.
@RickK101 @HislopMD yes yes..you sound like Stalin ...or something like that...

@SweetFreedom12 @HislopMD Nah. We are in the middle of a pandemic. The virus is dangerous, and not everyone has the ability to get vaccinated. Able-bodied people that CAN get vaccinated SHOULD get vaccinated- there isn’t a reason not to.
@HislopMD I have something better “It will cause sterilization”. Who comes up with these random false statements!?? Vaccination should be part of the biology curriculum in high schools.

@SweetFreedom12 @HislopMD Ok, facts matter. Please provide a citation for that figure, and do not include deaths resulting from the seatbelt failing to restrain.

The willingness to incur minor personal inconvenience to achieve much greater societal benefit is a fundamental component of civilization.
@HislopMD @mjaeckel it’s gene to therapy if you consider viruses genetic diseases
@RickK101 @HislopMD well..actually in 25% of accident cases - seat belts can be deadly...one size fit all , almost never works.
@SweetFreedom12 @HislopMD Exactly!  The same goes for prohibitions against smoking in restaurants and theaters, and don’t get me started about the tyranny of seat belts!
@HislopMD Hay Jon ...Inject your self as much as you want ...! Just let everybody else do whatever they want! Medical freedom not medical tyranny!!
@HislopMD Your tweet was in my TL about three away from someone RTing this article. It’s like the universe is emphasising the point. https://t.co/sjeM6GISHI
@HislopMD Wow, that is some powerful goop right there 😂
